title: The Clouded Sun
provenance_text:
Thomas B. Clarke, New York, NY, until 1899; sold at American Art Association, New York, NYFebruary 17, 1899,  lot no. 276 [1]. M. Knoedler and Co., New York, NY, 1899; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1899. 

Notes:
[1]. Thomas B. Clarke sale.

Under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: Newburgh (Orange county, New York state, United States)
